body.name: Quican Empower Your Lifestyle with Bluetooth Call Fitness Smartwatch for Women/Men, Alexa, Health and Sleep Tracker Smart Watch,Compatible Android iOS, Ideas Gift
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 17 mins
features: ✅【Smart Watch Support Phone Call, Accept Message, and Alexa】The smart watches for women and men seamlessly integrate with other devices and applications. Compatibility with smartphone operating systems (iOS or Android) and the ability to make and answer calls, and receive notifications, and messages directly on the watch. Otherwise, with its Alexa built-in, Voice assistant you can Ask to play music, hear the news, check the weather, control your smart home, and more with this device

✅【Waterproof Smart Watches Fitness Tracker with 120 Sports Modes and Advanced Health Monitor, Sleep Tracker, 】the fitness watch that offers health and fitness tracking features, including heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring, sleep tracking, step counting, and over 120 workout modes tracking. Accurate and detailed data insights help us stay motivated and make informed decisions about our health and wellness. Additionally, the waterproof smartwatches are designed to withstand daily wear and tear and are resistant to water, making them suitable for various activities.

✅【Android Smart Watches for Women Features 7-14 Days Battery Life And 2.5 Hours Quick Charging】 Having a decent battery life is crucial for us to ensure that our sport smartwatch lasts throughout the day without frequent recharging. Quican Bluetooth Smartwatch offers long battery life and has quick charging capabilities.

✅【Smart Watch's Straps are Replacement, 110 Dials Support Customization, and Style】Fitness smartwatches Come in 5 colors, that allow us to choose the colors to suit our style and preferences. Personalization options and 110 watch faces, and the straps are replacement (the strap fits for 22 mm width)

✅【Customer Support and Return Policy】Having access to responsive customer support and a flexible return policy provides us with peace of mind. In the event of any issues with our waterproof bluetooth smartwatch, Quican is ready to assist and offer a hassle-free return process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome watch! Tracks stress, blood oxygen, heart rate, sleep, calorie consumption, counts steps, sets exercise and weight goals, drinking water reminders, breathing excercise, several workout options, notifications, phone calls, and more. Very good app and easy to use. Perfect size, very good looking and excellent price! The only thing we would change is that the back is not very flat and sometimes it sits wrong on the wrist bones. Nothing horrible, but need to adjust at times. Apart from that it is perfection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this watch almost a month ago… I am so impressed with it honestly. The battery last quite a while. It tracks my steps, calories burned, track workouts, sleep, alarm.. I can view messages and answer phone calls from my watch. Overall it has been everything I was looking for and more I really have no negatives on this product. I am very happy and impressed! Price is great for all that you get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Battery lasted a week for me, the app took a while to load. They sent out a message apologizing, due to the increase usage of the app it was causing the lag. They even gifted two new skins for the inconvenience. Functionality is pretty good, the measurements seem to be correct. I read other reviews that said it wasn't, but it seems to be for me. You can't text from the watch, but you can call and talk. That feature works well, the person on the other end didn't seem to find an issue with hearing me. You do receive all notifications you grant permission for, so you can read the text messages, just can't reply. It's a nice smartwatch for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this watch so much I bought one for my husband. This watch does everything I need it to do. It connects to Bluetooth easily and keeps an accurate step count. There are many watch faces to choose from. You can accept phone calls and call quality is clear. The app works fluidly. It has many great features including monitoring your sleep, stress level, exercise, etc. I use mine to remind me to drink water! My experience with customer service was great too. They were polite, quick to respond, and helpful. I highly recommend this product for anyone thinking of purchasing a smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, worth it. Receive calls, text notifications from your social media. Music, alarm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband to try. It took forever to get it to pair. Then it would consistently drop off. On top of that, we couldn't get it to even allow us to register or sign on. We tried it on two phones thinking perhaps it was one of our phones settings. Same problem. It shouldn't take forever to set it up and use it much less even sign on to the Veryfit app. It went right back into the box and will be returned. No time for toys. I get that it's a very low cost item but it needs to at least work. I wanted to see if it was something he would use before investing in a higher ticket item. I'd stay clear of this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great smartwatch at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch for a coworker because I have bought one already for myself and my daughter and they are wonderful. They work amazing and are very comfortable to wear. I definitely recommend these smartwatches

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The watch looks good and has a nice, crisp display, it also has a variety of faces available for use. Battery life seems good. I have only had the watch for ten days and found the charge lasted about a week before recharging was needed. It came charged to 99% right out of the box. The watch has kept accurate time thus far. I know the step count is inaccurate when tested with an accurate pedometer (count has been high 1,500 to 2,500 steps each day) and it has already twice counted me as being asleep for a couple of hours when I was not asleep, once when I sat down to watch television one evening, another time when I sat down to read, so I really cannot count on any of the other health readings as being accurate. The phone feature seems fine based on the one time I accidentally used it since the call came through my watch when I dialed on my phone due to the close proximity of the phone and watch, I could hear well, the person I called could hear me well. I am rating the watch based on the reasons I bought it. I mostly wanted it to count steps and to track sleep and this really is not the best watch for those purposes, since it has very quickly proven to be very inaccurate in both of those areas. Since I cannot trust it in those two areas, I cannot trust it with any of the other health indicators.Update January 22, 2024: I have now updated my original review of January 18, 2024 from 1 star overall to 3 stars overall based on great customer service. They contacted me to offer a full refund or a replacement watch since this watch did not meet my expectations and they indicated they wanted another chance. I am keeping the watch due to the positives listed above (great customer service, great battery life, crisp display, accurate time, good call quality) and since I at least have a guesstimate of steps and sleep (and other health parameters too), even if the numbers are inaccurate. Based on all of those factors listed, the watch is a good value for the price.

Dopo svariati acquisti di smartwatch, ho deciso anche molto diffidente, di acquistare l’ennesimo, ciò è questo.. una volta arrivato, provato e studiato, sono rimasto stupito e super soddisfatto perché praticamente ci puoi fare tutto, l’unica pecca che non puoi scrivere messaggi o inviare vocali, ma sicuramente con un nuovo aggiornamento, lo renderanno disponibile !!! Super consigliato!!!
Ist doch nicht normal das ich die Uhr 2 mal Tage laden muss.

✅ Belle montre. Finitions qualitatives✅ Bracelets confortables, Réglage précis au poignet✅ Réception d'appels✅ Légère✅ Plus petite que la plupart: parfait pour les petits poignets⛔ Portée bleutooth limitée (comme souvent)⛔ L'écran n'est pas utilisé dans sa totalité⛔ Pas de rappel "boire de l'eau"⛔ Un 2ème passsant aurait été bien.📊 J'aime beaucoup cette montre mais elle a ses limites. Le portable doit resté à proximité (poche par exemple) pour recevoir les notifications ou appels.Réception d'appels très appréciable aux vues de son prix ! La qualité du son reste moyenne mais ça peut dépanner.Les fonctions "Musique" et "Photo" servent uniquement à controler le téléphone à distance.Pour les SMS, on peut y lire le début du message et connaitre l'expéditeur. Idem pour les notif Whatsapp et Messenger, Snap... mais bien sur pas y répondre.La montre est assez réactive.Son écran n'est pas trop grands, très bien pour les petits poignets (comme le mien) par contre l'écran n'est pas utilisé dans sa totalité... c'est dommage.Concernant l'autonomie, je la recharge toutes les semaines sans me servir du mode "Sommeil".Pour ma part, j'ai désactivé l'allumage à la rotation du poignet car elle s'allumait toutes les 10 secondes.Au bout de quelques jours, la montre est déjà rayée (l'écran et l'encadrement)Un film de protection devrait etre automatiquement fourni mais ce n'ai pas le cas...Je vous recommande d'en prévoir un 😉En espérant vous avoir aidé à faire votre choix 👍👋

reviews.reviewerName: I’m still waiting for this item
reviews.reviewText: When this smart watch got a low battery for the first time after buying it 2 weeks ago.. when I start charging it, it’s NOT CHARGING AT ALL!!! I did tried everything I know… but none of them work…. I am so disappointed with this product.. and returning it is hard to do as well… even I bought it just end of December 2023 and bought 2 years extended warranty, the return process is just so complicated to do.. unbelievable!!!
